c74object.name: CidLinkClient
c74object.digest: Send messages to a Cid network infrastructure

method.name: address
method.description: Specify the address and port of the Cid Link server you want to connect with. You will need to include http:// and a :port to your address. If you server is local it would be something like http://127.0.0.1:5000, where http:// is the protocol used to establish connection, 127.0.0.1 is the internal ip of your machine, and 5000 is the port your server is listening to

method.name: roomName
method.digest: Create or join a room on the connected server
method.description: After you connect to a server you need to join a room. This message creates one if none with the given name is provided.

method.name: password
method.description: This password must be set before joining a room. If the room you join did not exist, having a password set will require all users to set the same password to establish communication. For privacy, it is better to create this message and then hide it in a subpatcher.
